Text: Get rid of your rar shit and people will download from you.

seriously, this is n00bish. Same file, in dozens of split rars: 1018.08MiB; just the .mkv, no rar BS: 996.24MiB, about twice as many peers. Wonder why? I can't believe it's almost 2013 and there's still n00bs posting split rars.
That's a rudiment of the newsgroups epoch. It will die out someday, just not right now.
